title: Kadhale Kadhale Lyrics Indru Netru Naalai
stanzas:
Kadhale kadhale
ennai udaitheney
ennil unnai adaithaeney
uyir katti iniathaeney

netrinai kaatrile
kotti iraitheney
imai kattu avilthaeney
thuyar mattum
maraithaeney

nizhalaadum ninaivil nindru
kalavaadi tharuven endru
kediaaram kaalam neram
suzhatriduven

unai kaanaa ulagam sendru
angaeyum idhayam thandhu
pudhithaaga kadhal
ondru nigazhthiduven.

indru netru naalai
endrum neeye dhevathai.
kadhal seiyyum maayai
en vaanam engum
poo mazhai.

manadhodu mattum innum
uravaadum nesam ondru
uyirodu yedho ondru
virattiyadhe

padi yaeri keezhe sellum
puriyaatha paadhai ondru
adhileri pogacholli
kulappiyathe.

kaalam kadanthaalum
mazhai neerai pola neram
kanmun enna sindhuthu
en sindhanaiyile

kedikaaram vaanga ponaal
andha neram vaangi vandhaai
enna naanum seiveno
endhan uyire..

indru netru naalai
endrum neeye dhevathai.
kadhal seiyyum maayai
en vaanam engum
poo mazhai.

seo.title: Kadhale Kadhale Lyrics Indru Netru Naalai
seo.description: Get the complete Kadhale Kadhale Lyrics Indru Netru Naalai  from Indru Netru Naalai. Read the lyrics penned by Vivek and composed by Hip Hop Tamizha and sung by Padmalatha. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vivek, Indru Netru Naalai, Hip Hop Tamizha, Padmalatha, Shankar Mahadevan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
